CustomField.formula:
CASE(1, IF((( Account.DataVigencia__c >= DATE(2021,01,02) && Account.DataVigencia__c <= DATE(2021,02,01)) || ISBLANK(Account.DataVigencia__c)),1,0),'Janeiro',
IF(( Account.DataVigencia__c >= DATE(2021,02,02) && Account.DataVigencia__c <= DATE(2021,03,01)),1,0),'Fevereiro',
IF(( Account.DataVigencia__c >= DATE(2021,03,02) && Account.DataVigencia__c <= DATE(2021,04,01)),1,0),'Março',
IF(( Account.DataVigencia__c >= DATE(2021,04,02) && Account.DataVigencia__c <= DATE(2021,05,01)),1,0),'Abril',
IF(( Account.DataVigencia__c >= DATE(2021,05,02) && Account.DataVigencia__c <= DATE(2021,06,01)),1,0),'Maio',
IF(( Account.DataVigencia__c >= DATE(2021,06,02) && Account.DataVigencia__c <= DATE(2021,07,01)),1,0),'Junho',
IF(( Account.DataVigencia__c >= DATE(2021,07,02) && Account.DataVigencia__c <= DATE(2021,08,01)),1,0),'Julho',
IF(( Account.DataVigencia__c >= DATE(2021,08,02) && Account.DataVigencia__c <= DATE(2021,09,01)),1,0),'Agosto',
IF(( Account.DataVigencia__c >= DATE(2021,09,02) && Account.DataVigencia__c <= DATE(2021,10,01)),1,0),'Setembro',
IF(( Account.DataVigencia__c >= DATE(2021,10,02) && Account.DataVigencia__c <= DATE(2021,11,01)),1,0),'Outubro',
IF(( Account.DataVigencia__c >= DATE(2021,11,02) && Account.DataVigencia__c <= DATE(2021,12,01)),1,0),'Novembro',
IF(( Account.DataVigencia__c >= DATE(2021,12,02) && Account.DataVigencia__c <= DATE(2022,01,01)),1,0),'Dezembro',
'Janeiro')
CustomField.label: Competência vigência
